roleData.title: Teaching Assistant - CS3520 Programming in C++
roleData.description:
- Assisted in teaching core C++ concepts, including memory management, object-oriented programming, and debugging.
 - Held weekly office hours and supported over 80 students through Piazza, email, and live sessions.

roleData.title: Software Developer Internship
roleData.description:
- Created AgriTrack, a full-stack web application that aims to help farmers track to farm operations, crop yields, harvest data and etc.
- Collaborated with other interns to design and distribute questionnaire, collecting valuable feedback from farmers.

roleData.title: STEM Literacy Volunteer
roleData.description:
- Helped middle school students in preparation for the Boston Public Schools Science Fair.
- Mentored students with writing technical reports and essays.
- Supported students research in STEM areas including Environmental Science and Game Design.
